summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4845 for the improvement of the alley in block 20, Bell & Denny's 1st Addition, being the alley between 1st Avenue and 2nd Avenue, from Vine Street to Cedar Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 55756, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
